item.title: About this handbook
item.description: About this handbook # What the program is about 1 # Effective altruism (EA) is an ongoing project to find the best ways to do good, and put them into practice. Our core goal with this program is to introduce you to some of the principles and thinking tools behind effective altruism. We hope that these tools can help you as you think through how you can best help the world.
